title.rendered: “IDF Intensifies Strikes on Hezbollah: Key Militant Targets Hit in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF continues to strike Hezbollah targets in Lebanon; Hezbollah operatives and the organization’s terror objectives have been attacked.

IDF forces identified a militant at a Hezbollah observation post in the Ayta a-Shab area earlier today. Shortly thereafter, the position where the militant was located was targeted.

In the Yaroun area in southern Lebanon, the forces identified a militant entering a military structure of the Hezbollah terror organization. In a quick response, an Air Force fighter jet targeted the structure where the militant was present.

Additionally, fighter jets attacked a military structure of Hezbollah in the Ramiah area in southern Lebanon.

IDF forces conducted fire throughout the day to eliminate threats in the Ayta a-Shab, Al-Jibin, and Talousa areas.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3KRMjAd
